person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Patasse offered concessions and amnesty to rebels before the May rebellion ended after rebels looted the city centre .

| Person |
| --- |

| rebels |

Note: I included "rebels" as a Person entity because it refers to a group of people. "Patasse" is also a Person entity, as it refers to Ange-Felix Patasse, who was the President of the Central African Republic at the time.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

Note: I removed "rebels" as a Person entity because it can refer to either a group of people or the concept of rebellion in general. In this context, it is unclear whether "rebels" refers to a specific group of people or is used more generally to refer to the concept of rebellion. Therefore, I have excluded it from the list of Person entities.
